name: kick-assembler-vscode-ext
displayName: Kick Assembler (C64) for Visual Studio Code
description: Kick Assembler (C64) IDE Extension for Visual Studio Code
author: Paul Hocker

commands.title: Kick Assembler: Build and Run Startup
Kick Assembler: Build and Debug Startup

kickassembler.assemblerJar.description: Full path to your Kick Assembler JAR file.

kickassembler.javaRuntime.description: Full path to your Java runtime.

kickassembler.javaPlugins.description: Full classpath to your Java plugins.

kickassembler.javaPluginSystemProperties.description: Individual properties/values used by your plugins. For example KICKASS_CRUNCHER_CACHE=true

kickassembler.emulatorRuntime.description: Full path to your emulator runtime.

kickassembler.emulatorViceSymbols.description: Export labels to a file which can be read by VICE

kickassembler.debuggerRuntime.description: Full path to your debugger runtime.

kickassembler.outputDirectory.description: Where to store output files generated by Kick Assembler (no trailing slashes)

kickassembler.autoAssembleTrigger.markdownDescription:
Which event should trigger automatic assembling for code inspection purposes.

Hint: Using **onSave only** in combination with `#files.autoSave#` **afterDelay** could improve performance

kickassembler.autoAssembleTriggerDelay.markdownDescription:
This setting controls the delay in ms after you have stopped typing until it tries to assemble. This only applies when `#kickassembler.autoAssembleTrigger#` is set to **onChange and onSave**.

Note: Setting this to zero might impact performance. Try the default setting first and try lowering it from there.

kickassembler.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

kickassembler.completionParameterPlaceho.markdownDescription:
Insert placeholder parameters on function/macro completions.
>Attention: Intellisense in placeholders won't work until you disable `#editor.suggest.snippetsPreventQuickSuggestions#`

kickassembler.fileTypesBinary.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **LoadBinary()** or **.import binary**

kickassembler.fileTypesSid.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **LoadSid()**

kickassembler.fileTypesPicture.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **LoadPicture()**

kickassembler.fileTypesSource.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **.import source** or **#import**

kickassembler.fileTypesC64.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **.import c64**

kickassembler.fileTypesText.markdownDescription: Comma separated list of file extensions for **.import text**

kickassembler.assemblerLibraryPaths.description: Library paths where Kick Assembler will look when it tries to open external files and does not find the given file in the current directory path first.

kickassembler.startup.description: This setting will override the current open file for assembling, and will instead use this file. This can be considered your master or startup file for your project. In the future this might be replaced with a generic project configuration file.

kickassembler.codeSneakPeekLines.description: How many lines of code should be shown at named label referencing on hover and intellisense.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
